html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){
html +='<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_'+id+navJson[i].is_selected+'" ><a href="'+[].concat(navData[id][1])[navJson[i].nav_flag-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+navData[id][0]+'</a></li>';
}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();
</script></div>        <div id="body" class="body ">            <div class="container_box">                <div class="container_hd"><h2>            实时消息</h2></div><div class="container_bd"><div (function(){

index : '/cgi-bin/home?t=home/index',

}

navJson.push({nav_id:"messages",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:"1"=="1"?" selected":""});

navJson.push({nav_id:"settings",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"advanced",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"merchant",nav_flag:"0",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
  

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){

}],

}],

};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){

}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

index : '/cgi-bin/home?t=home/index',

}

navJson.push({nav_id:"settings",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"advanced",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"merchant",nav_flag:"0",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
  

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){

}],

"settings":['设置', URL.setting],

}],
"merchant":['商户模块',[URL.businessVerify, URL.business]]
};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){
html +='<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_'+id+navJson[i].is_selected+'" ><a href="'+[].concat(navData[id][1])[navJson[i].nav_flag-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+navData[id][0]+'</a></li>';
}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],

}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){
html +='<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_'+id+navJson[i].is_selected+'" ><a href="'+[].concat(navData[id][1])[navJson[i].nav_flag-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+navData[id][0]+'</a></li>';
}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();
</script></div>        <div id="body" class="body ">            <div class="container_box">                <div class="container_hd"><h2>            实时消息</h2></div><div class="container_bd"><div "settings":['设置', URL.setting],
"advanced":['高级功能', URL.advanced, function(i, index,is_selected){
return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_advanced'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"merchant":['商户模块',[URL.businessVerify, URL.business]]
};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){
html +='<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_'+id+navJson[i].is_selected+'" ><a href="'+[].concat(navData[id][1])[navJson[i].nav_flag-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+navData[id][0]+'</a></li>';
}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

index : '/cgi-bin/home?t=home/index',

}

navJson.push({nav_id:"messages",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:"1"=="1"?" selected":""});

navJson.push({nav_id:"settings",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"advanced",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"merchant",nav_flag:"0",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
  

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){

}],

}],

};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){

}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

(function(){

index : '/cgi-bin/home?t=home/index',

business : '/cgi-bin/business?t=business/index&action=index',
businessVerify : '/cgi-bin/business?t=business/overview&action=overview'
}
var navJson=[];
navJson.push({nav_id:"home",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"messages",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:"1"=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"contact",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"masssend",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});

navJson.push({nav_id:"materials",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"settings",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"advanced",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"merchant",nav_flag:"0",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
  

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){
return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_statistics'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"materials":['素材管理', [URL.materialText, URL.materialGoods]],
"settings":['设置', URL.setting],
"advanced":['高级功能', URL.advanced, function(i, index,is_selected){

}],
"merchant":['商户模块',[URL.businessVerify, URL.business]]
};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){
html +='<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_'+id+navJson[i].is_selected+'" ><a href="'+[].concat(navData[id][1])[navJson[i].nav_flag-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+navData[id][0]+'</a></li>';
}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_advanced'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"merchant":['商户模块',[URL.businessVerify, URL.business]]
};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){
html +='<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_'+id+navJson[i].is_selected+'" ><a href="'+[].concat(navData[id][1])[navJson[i].nav_flag-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+navData[id][0]+'</a></li>';
}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

(function(){
var URL = {
index : '/cgi-bin/home?t=home/index',
message : '/cgi-bin/message?t=message/list&count=20&day=7',

advanced : '/cgi-bin/advanced?action=index&t=advanced/index',
business : '/cgi-bin/business?t=business/index&action=index',
businessVerify : '/cgi-bin/business?t=business/overview&action=overview'
}
var navJson=[];
navJson.push({nav_id:"home",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"messages",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:"1"=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"contact",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"masssend",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"statistics",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"materials",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"settings",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"advanced",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"merchant",nav_flag:"0",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
  

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){
return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_statistics'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"materials":['素材管理', [URL.materialText, URL.materialGoods]],
"settings":['设置', URL.setting],
"advanced":['高级功能', URL.advanced, function(i, index,is_selected){
return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_advanced'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"merchant":['商户模块',[URL.businessVerify, URL.business]]
};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){
html +='<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_'+id+navJson[i].is_selected+'" ><a href="'+[].concat(navData[id][1])[navJson[i].nav_flag-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+navData[id][0]+'</a></li>';
}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],

}],

};

if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){

}

}
};

})();

(function(){
var URL = {
index : '/cgi-bin/home?t=home/index',
message : '/cgi-bin/message?t=message/list&count=20&day=7',

advanced : '/cgi-bin/advanced?action=index&t=advanced/index',
business : '/cgi-bin/business?t=business/index&action=index',
businessVerify : '/cgi-bin/business?t=business/overview&action=overview'
}
var navJson=[];
navJson.push({nav_id:"home",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"messages",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:"1"=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"contact",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"masssend",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"statistics",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"materials",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"settings",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"advanced",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"merchant",nav_flag:"0",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
  

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){
return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_statistics'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"materials":['素材管理', [URL.materialText, URL.materialGoods]],
"settings":['设置', URL.setting],
"advanced":['高级功能', URL.advanced, function(i, index,is_selected){
return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_advanced'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"merchant":['商户模块',[URL.businessVerify, URL.business]]
};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){
html +='<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_'+id+navJson[i].is_selected+'" ><a href="'+[].concat(navData[id][1])[navJson[i].nav_flag-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+navData[id][0]+'</a></li>';
}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

"home":['首页', URL.index],

(function(){
var URL = {
index : '/cgi-bin/home?t=home/index',
message : '/cgi-bin/message?t=message/list&count=20&day=7',

advanced : '/cgi-bin/advanced?action=index&t=advanced/index',
business : '/cgi-bin/business?t=business/index&action=index',
businessVerify : '/cgi-bin/business?t=business/overview&action=overview'
}
var navJson=[];
navJson.push({nav_id:"home",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"messages",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:"1"=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"contact",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"masssend",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"statistics",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"materials",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"settings",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"advanced",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"merchant",nav_flag:"0",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
  

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){
return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_statistics'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"materials":['素材管理', [URL.materialText, URL.materialGoods]],
"settings":['设置', URL.setting],
"advanced":['高级功能', URL.advanced, function(i, index,is_selected){
return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_advanced'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"merchant":['商户模块',[URL.businessVerify, URL.business]]
};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){
html +='<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_'+id+navJson[i].is_selected+'" ><a href="'+[].concat(navData[id][1])[navJson[i].nav_flag-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+navData[id][0]+'</a></li>';
}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],

}
};

(function(){
var URL = {
index : '/cgi-bin/home?t=home/index',
message : '/cgi-bin/message?t=message/list&count=20&day=7',

advanced : '/cgi-bin/advanced?action=index&t=advanced/index',
business : '/cgi-bin/business?t=business/index&action=index',
businessVerify : '/cgi-bin/business?t=business/overview&action=overview'
}
var navJson=[];
navJson.push({nav_id:"home",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"messages",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:"1"=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"contact",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"masssend",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"statistics",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"materials",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"settings",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"advanced",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"merchant",nav_flag:"0",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
  

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){
return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_statistics'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"materials":['素材管理', [URL.materialText, URL.materialGoods]],
"settings":['设置', URL.setting],
"advanced":['高级功能', URL.advanced, function(i, index,is_selected){
return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_advanced'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"merchant":['商户模块',[URL.businessVerify, URL.business]]
};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){
html +='<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_'+id+navJson[i].is_selected+'" ><a href="'+[].concat(navData[id][1])[navJson[i].nav_flag-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+navData[id][0]+'</a></li>';
}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],

                _img.src = wx.url(location.protocol + "//" + location.host + "/cgi-bin/getico" + "?location=" + (i||-1) + "&rand=" + Math.random());

navJson.push({nav_id:"settings",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"advanced",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"merchant",nav_flag:"0",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
  

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){
return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_statistics'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"materials":['素材管理', [URL.materialText, URL.materialGoods]],
"settings":['设置', URL.setting],
"advanced":['高级功能', URL.advanced, function(i, index,is_selected){
return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_advanced'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"merchant":['商户模块',[URL.businessVerify, URL.business]]
};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){
html +='<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_'+id+navJson[i].is_selected+'" ><a href="'+[].concat(navData[id][1])[navJson[i].nav_flag-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+navData[id][0]+'</a></li>';
}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

(function(){
var URL = {
index : '/cgi-bin/home?t=home/index',
message : '/cgi-bin/message?t=message/list&count=20&day=7',
user : '/cgi-bin/contactmanage?t=user/index&pagesize=10&pageidx=0&type=0&groupid=0',
masssend : '/cgi-bin/masssendpage?t=wxm-send',
masssendStatement : '/cgi-bin/indexpage?t=wxm-statement',
statistics : '/cgi-bin/pluginlogin?t=wxm-mta&op=cftreg&pluginid=luopan',
materialText : '/cgi-bin/operate_appmsg?sub=list&type=10&subtype=3&t=wxm-appmsgs-list-new&pagesize=10&pageidx=0',
materialGoods : '/cgi-bin/operate_appmsg?sub=list&type=11&subtype=3&t=wxm-bizmsgs-list-new&pagesize=10&pageidx=0',
setting : '/cgi-bin/userinfopage?t=wxm-setting',
advanced : '/cgi-bin/advanced?action=index&t=advanced/index',
business : '/cgi-bin/business?t=business/index&action=index',
businessVerify : '/cgi-bin/business?t=business/overview&action=overview'
}
var navJson=[];
navJson.push({nav_id:"home",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"messages",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:"1"=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"contact",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"masssend",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"statistics",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"materials",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"settings",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"advanced",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"merchant",nav_flag:"0",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
  

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){
return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_statistics'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"materials":['素材管理', [URL.materialText, URL.materialGoods]],
"settings":['设置', URL.setting],
"advanced":['高级功能', URL.advanced, function(i, index,is_selected){
return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_advanced'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"merchant":['商户模块',[URL.businessVerify, URL.business]]
};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){
html +='<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_'+id+navJson[i].is_selected+'" ><a href="'+[].concat(navData[id][1])[navJson[i].nav_flag-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+navData[id][0]+'</a></li>';
}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

}
};

(function(){

index : '/cgi-bin/home?t=home/index',

}

navJson.push({nav_id:"messages",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:"1"=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"contact",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});

navJson.push({nav_id:"materials",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"settings",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"advanced",nav_flag:"1",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
navJson.push({nav_id:"merchant",nav_flag:"0",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
  

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){

}],
"materials":['素材管理', [URL.materialText, URL.materialGoods]],
"settings":['设置', URL.setting],
"advanced":['高级功能', URL.advanced, function(i, index,is_selected){

}],
"merchant":['商户模块',[URL.businessVerify, URL.business]]
};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){
html +='<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_'+id+navJson[i].is_selected+'" ><a href="'+[].concat(navData[id][1])[navJson[i].nav_flag-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+navData[id][0]+'</a></li>';
}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],

}],

};

if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){

}

}
};

})();

(function(){

navJson.push({nav_id:"merchant",nav_flag:"0",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
  

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){

}],

}],

};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){

}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};

"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],

if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){

}
};

(function(){

navJson.push({nav_id:"merchant",nav_flag:"0",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
  

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){

}],

}],

};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){

}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};

"home":['首页', URL.index],

}
};

(function(){

navJson.push({nav_id:"merchant",nav_flag:"0",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
  

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){

}],

}],

};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){

}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};

"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],

if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){

}
};

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],

}],

}],

};

for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);

}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],

}],

}],

};

for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);

}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};

}

navJson.push({nav_id:"merchant",nav_flag:"0",is_selected:""=="1"?" selected":""});
  

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){

}],

}],

};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){

}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};

}
};

"home":['首页', URL.index],

}

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){

}],

};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){

}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],

}

}
};

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],

if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){

}

}
};

"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],

if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){

}

}
};

"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],

}

}
};

"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],

if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){

}

}
};

}

var navData={
"home":['首页', URL.index],
"messages":['实时消息', URL.message],
"contact":['用户管理', URL.user],
"masssend":['群发消息', [URL.masssend, URL.masssendStatement]],
"statistics":['数据统计', URL.statistics, function(i, index,is_selected){

}],

};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);

}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

return '<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_statistics'+is_selected+'"><a href="'+[].concat(this[1])[index-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+this[0]+'<i class="icon18_adorn new"></i></a></li>'
}],
"materials":['素材管理', [URL.materialText, URL.materialGoods]],
"settings":['设置', URL.setting],
"advanced":['高级功能', URL.advanced, function(i, index,is_selected){

}],
"merchant":['商户模块',[URL.businessVerify, URL.business]]
};

var html='';
for(var i in navJson){
if(navJson[i].nav_flag>0){
var id=navJson[i].nav_id;
if(navData[id]&&navData[id][2]&&typeof navData[id][2]=="function"){
html += navData[id][2].call(navData[id], i, navJson[i].nav_flag, navJson[i].is_selected);
}else if(navData[id]&&navData[id].length>0){
html +='<li data-index="' + i + '" class="nav_item js_'+id+navJson[i].is_selected+'" ><a href="'+[].concat(navData[id][1])[navJson[i].nav_flag-1]+'&token=1508639828&lang=zh_CN">'+navData[id][0]+'</a></li>';
}
            navJson[i].is_selected !="";
}
};
    document.getElementById('navigatorBar').innerHTML = html;
})();

            function getico(i){

                _img.src = wx.url(location.protocol + "//" + location.host + "/cgi-bin/getico" + "?location=" + (i||-1) + "&rand=" + Math.random());
